meanings.definition: The craft or business of making cabinets, furniture, or other woodwork.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather learned cabinetworks from his father and now makes beautiful furniture.
meanings.sent2: The store specialized in cabinetworks, offering a variety of handcrafted cabinets and tables.
meanings.sent3: During the cabinetworks class, the students accidentally glued their project to the table.
meanings.sent4: Her cabinetworks skills were like magic, transforming raw wood into elegant pieces.
meanings.sent5: The smell of sawdust filled the air as the cabinetworks master worked on his latest creation.

meanings.definition: The products of a cabinetmaker or cabinetmakers.
meanings.sent1: The showroom displayed a stunning collection of cabinetworks, showcasing the artistry of the craftsmen.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop featured exquisite cabinetworks from the 18th century.
meanings.sent3: The cabinetworks in the store seemed to whisper stories of the past to the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The cabinetworks in the room added a touch of elegance to the otherwise plain decor.
meanings.sent5: Each piece of cabinetworks bore the unique signature style of the talented cabinetmaker.
